question.question-text: What main topic is the professor discussing?

answer-text.exp: How an event hundreds of years ago affects a product today

answer-list.answer-text: Why cheese is so popular in America today
What happened during the American Revolution

question.explain-text: In the lecture, the professor asks is anyone aware that a boycott in 1776 is still affecting the American cheese industry today? and states that to introduce our unit on commercial cheese production, I'm going to talk about this boycott. From this, it can be determined that the main topic that the professor is discussing is how an event hundreds of years ago affects a product today. The first answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: What unit is the class beginning with this lecture?

answer-list.answer-text: Different kinds of cheese and where they come from

question.explain-text: In the lecture, the professor states that the purpose of this story is to introduce our unit on commercial cheese production. This means that the unit the class is beginning is commercial cheese production. The third answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: What products discussed in the lecture were boycotted by the American colonists?
question.explain-text: In the lecture, the professor states that colonists protested by boycotting English products, that the most famous of these is tea, that a lesser-known product that the colonists boycotted was cheddar cheese, and that American cheese was easily identified as orange cheddar. From this it can be determined that the colonists boycotted white cheese and English tea. The second and third answers are therefore the best answers to this question.

question.question-text: Which of the following statements would an American colonist most likely have said?

answer-list.answer-text: "Using boycotts to get what I want is usually not very effective."

answer-text.exp: "I would rather use American products than pay taxes to use English products."

answer-list.answer-text: "Cheese actually tastes better to me with carrot juice in it, and it looks better, too."
"Because there is a boycott on cheese, I'm not going to eat cheese any more."

question.explain-text: In the lecture, the professor states that the colonists felt that it was unfair that they were required to pay ever-increasing taxes on products imported from England, that many colonists refused to buy English cheddar because they would have to pay huge taxes on it, and that the colonists strongly preferred American cheese over more heavily-taxed English cheese. From this, it can be determined that an American colonist would most likely have said "I would rather use American products than pay taxes to use English products." The second answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

American colonists had to pay taxes on
English imports.

products.

explain-list.explain-text: The professor states that the colonists felt it was unfair that they were required to pay ever-increasing taxes on products imported from England. From this, it can be determined that it is included in the lecture that American colonists had to pay taxes on English imports. You should therefore click in the YES column.

The professor states that many American colonists protested by boycotting English products. From this, it can be determined that it is NOT discussed in the lecture that the English began to boycott American products. You should therefore click in the NO column.

The professor states that to distinguish American cheese, American farmers added carrot juice to their milk. From this, it can be determined that it is NOT discussed in the lecture that farmers added carrot juice to English cheese. You should therefore click in the NO column.

The professor states that the orange coloring in American cheese remained. From this, it can be determined that is NOT mentioned that American cheese is white cheddar. You should therefore click in the NO column.

question.question-text: What will be discussed during the next class session?
question.explain-text: In the lecture, the professor mentions that tomorrow, we'll discuss commercial production of soft cheeses. This means that commercial production of soft cheese will be discussed in the next class session. The third answer is therefore the best answer to this question.
